prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgeContent: Uranium Glass Garden Gnomes are the newest product in the eshop. They are made of glass with a fluorescent uranium oxide added to the glass mixture. The gnomes are equipped with a UV LED light that makes them glow in the dark. They are great for scaring away birds and snakes.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content:
---

Uranium Glass Garden Gnomes are a new product available in the eshop. These decorative items are made from glass that contains fluorescent uranium oxide, giving them unique properties.

---

The gnomes are equipped with UV LED lights, which cause them to glow in the dark. This feature enhances their visual appeal and functionality in low-light conditions.

---

These garden gnomes serve a practical purpose beyond decoration, as they are designed to deter birds and snakes from entering the garden area.

content.text:
---

Uranium Glass Garden Gnomes are a new product available in the eshop. These decorative items are made from glass that contains fluorescent uranium oxide, giving them unique properties.

---

The gnomes are equipped with UV LED lights, which cause them to glow in the dark. This feature enhances their visual appeal and functionality in low-light conditions.

These garden gnomes serve a practical purpose beyond decoration, as they are designed to deter birds and snakes from entering the garden area.
